stanza.line: Some say thy fault is youth some wantonness
Some say thy grace is youth and gentlesport
Both grace and faults are loved of more and less
Thou mak faults graces that to theeresort
As on the finger of a thronedqueen
The basest jewel will be wellesteemed
So are those errors that in thee areseen
To truths translated and for true thingsdeemed
How many lambs might the stern wolfbetray
If like a lamb he could his lookstranslate
How many gazers mightst thou leadaway
if thou wouldst use the strength of all thystate
But do not so I love thee in suchsort
As thou being mine mine is thy goodreport
